|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/ANATEL/03307-15-08916/ ANATEL/03307-15-08916/] (01/27/2016) {{see also|Askey RTF3505VW-GV|SerComm H500-s|MitraStar}} ===Specifications=== :HW Interface: *WAN: One Giga optical interface (SC/APC) *LAN: Four 10/100/1000 RJ-45 interfaces *WLAN: Two 2x2 2.4GHz external antenna, :Three 3x3 5GHz internal antenna *FXS: POTS port for 2 FXS *USB: Two USB 2.0 Host ports *LED indicators: Power, PON, Internet, Ethernet, :Wireless 2.4GHz, Wireless 5GHz, USB, VoIP *Power supply: 12V DC, 2A For accessing a complete shell in SSH, will be needed to specify the default user and password of the router and the first command should be /bin/sh. For example, in unix like systems the command would be ssh 1234@192.168.1.1 /bin/sh. Also, for activating and deactivating remote management services like http and ssh, it can be done by the page http://192.168.1.1/remoteMGMT.html [[Category:English Documentation]]
